summary: Health insight module updates: replace the "Energy level" metric with "PCOD & PCOS risks".

existing_features.title: In the Health Insights section of the dashboard, replace the existing "Energy Levels" insight tile with a new tile labeled "PCOD & PCOS Risks".

Update the click handler/logging for the replaced Health Insights tile so it no longer references energy predictions and instead references PCOD & PCOS risks (user-facing text remains unchanged aside from the tile label).

new_feature_requests.summary: In Health Insight, replace the "Energy level" item/metric with "PCOD & PCOS risks".

projectName: Replace Health Insights tile 'Energy Levels' with 'PCOD & PCOS Risks'
